src:
Buntut Korupsi Upsus Siwab, Bupati & Sekda Blora Penuhi Panggilan Kejati Jateng
06 Nov 2019, 15:52 by Tika Vilystya Budiman



Buntut Korupsi Upsus Siwab, Bupati & Sekda Blora Penuhi Panggilan Kejati Jateng



Buntut Korupsi Upsus Siwab, Bupati & Sekda Blora Penuhi Panggilan Kejati Jateng


KBRN, Semarang: Penyidik  Kejaksaan Tinggi (Kejati) Jawa Tengah memeriksa Bupati Blora, Djoko Nugroho sebagai saksi dalam dugaan kasus korupsi program Upaya Khusus Sapi Indukan Wajib Bunting (Upsus Siwab) Dinas Peternakan Kabupaten Blora tahun 2017.
“Banyak ya tadi ada 11 pertanyaan sepertinya,” kata Bupati Djoko yang berhasil dimintai komentarnya usai dipriksa sekitar 3 jam sebelum akhirnya masuk kedalam mobil dinas yang menjemputnya dari Pintu belakang Kantor Kejati Jateng, Rabu (6/11/2019)
Djoko mengaku tidak mengetahui perihal penggunaan dana inseminasi dalam program kementrian tersebut.
“Ndak tau saya, itu kan dana dari APBN yang diberikan ke  provinsi langsung kesana,” katanya.
Turut dipriksa juga dalam kesempatan itu, namun tidak berhasil ditemui awak media yakni  Sekretaris Daerah (Sekda) Blora, Komang Gede Irawadi.
Aspidsus Kejati jateng, Ketut Sumedana membenarkan ada pemeriksaan bupati namun hanya 11 pertanyaan.
“Tapi kesaksiannya kebanyakan ndak paham kerena tidak terlibat langsung,” tandasnya.
Ketut menambahkan untuk pemeriksaan sekda terdapat sekitar 20 pertanyaan yang diberikan penyidik.
“Dia menjabat sekda ternyata baru tahun 2018, jadi ga tau dia keuangan tahun 2017,  Hasil pemeriksaan nanti penyidik kewenangannya, apakah diperlukan pendalaman lebih lanjut itu kewenangan penyidik,” katanya.
Ketut menyebut hingga kini telah ada sekitar 65 saksi yang telah dipriksa.
“Kalau sekarang sudah tahap kedua, paling enggak minggu depanlah ada pelimpahan untuk Wahyu , kalau Karsimin masih nanti,” jelasnya.
Seperti diberitaan RRI sebelumnya, Kejati telah menetapkan 2 tersangka. Pertama, Mantan Kepala Dinas Peternakan Blora  Wahyu  Agustini dan kedua Mantan Sekretaris dinasnya  Karsimin.
Wahyu  Agustini baru saja menyelesaikan masa penahanan selama 20 hari pada  3 November lalu di Lembaga Penasyarakatan kelas II Wanita Semarang. Sementara, (KM) sedang menjalani masa penahanan sejak 31 Oktober- 13 November 2019 di Lapas Klas 1 Kedungpane.
Keduanya berperan sebagai inisiator dalam mengumpulkan dan menggunakan dana diluar keperluan program Upsus Siwab.
“Infonya digunakan untuk kepentingan perjalanan, selebihnya untuk kepentingan pribadi, diluar kepentingan upsus siwab,” kata Aspidsus sebelumnya.
Menurutnya, dari total Rp 2 miliar dana upsus siwab yang dikucurkan kementrian, senilai Rp 670 juta diantaranya dikumpulkan untuk keperluan lain diluar program tersebut.
Atas kasus tersebut tersangka dikenakan pasal 12, 11 Undang- Undang tindak pidana korupsi.
text:
Aftermath Corruption Upsus Siwab, Regent & Secretary Blora Fulfill Central Java Prosecutor's Vocation
Nov 6, 2019, 15:52 by Tika Vilystya Budiman



Aftermath Corruption Upsus Siwab, Regent & Secretary Blora Fulfill Central Java Prosecutor's Vocation



Aftermath Corruption Upsus Siwab, Regent & Secretary Blora Fulfill Central Java Prosecutor's Vocation


KBRN, Semarang: Central Java Prosecutor's Office (Kejati) Investigator examined Blora Regent, Djoko Nugroho as a witness in the alleged corruption case of the Upsus Siwab Obligatory Livestock Special Efforts (Upsus Siwab) Livestock Service Office in 2017.
"There are a lot of 11 questions, it seems like," said Regent Djoko who was asked for his comments after being questioned for about 3 hours before finally getting into the official car that picked him up from the back door of the Central Java Prosecutor's Office, Wednesday (11/06/2019)
Djoko claimed not to know about the use of insemination funds in the ministry's program.
"I do not know, that's the funds from the state budget that are given directly to the provinces," he said.
Also examined on this occasion, but was not able to be met by the media crew namely Regional Secretary (Sekda) Blora, Komang Gede Irawadi.
Aspidsus Central Java Prosecutor, Ketut Sumedana confirmed there was an examination of the regent, but only 11 questions.
"But most of the testimonies do not understand because they are not directly involved," he said.
Ketut added that for the Regional Secretary examination there were about 20 questions given by investigators.
"He was in charge of the regional secretary, it turned out that it was only in 2018, so he did not know he was finances in 2017. The results of the investigation will be the authority of the investigators, whether further investigation is needed for the authority of investigators," he said.
Ketut said that up to now there have been around 65 witnesses who have been examined.
"If it is now the second stage, at least next week there will be a delegation to Wahyu, if Karsimin is still later," he explained.
Like the previous RRI news, Kejati has set 2 suspects. First, Former Head of the Livestock Services Office of Blora Wahyu Agustini and second Former Secretary of his office Karsimin.
Wahyu Agustini had just completed his 20-day detention period on November 3 at the Semarang Women's Class II Penitentiary. Meanwhile, (KM) is undergoing a period of detention from 31 October to 13 November 2019 at Lapung Class 1 Kedungpane.
Both of them acted as initiators in collecting and using funds outside of the Upsus Siwab program.
"The information is used for travel purposes, the rest is for personal interests, outside the interests of UPSus Siwab," Aspidsus said earlier.
According to him, from a total of Rp 2 billion in the funds of the siwab upsus disbursed by the ministry, a total of Rp 670 million was collected for other purposes outside the program.
In this case, the suspect is subject to Article 12, 11 of the Corruption Act.
